message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $13000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11000. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I can see you're a serious buyer, but I'm afraid I'm not willing to go as low as $11000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. How about $12500?
I understand your concerns about making a profit, but I'm still not comfortable with $12500. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I can only go up to $11500. Can you consider that?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Bob, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $11500. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make a profit. How about we meet at $12250?
